name: json-playback-recorder-ts
description: Framework for integrate entity object graph operations (field, collections modifications, etc) between backend and frontend.

scripts.build: npm run clear-all && npm run build-umd && npm run build-es2015 && npm run build-esnext && npm run build-dist-test && npm run build-dist-dev
scripts.build-umd: npm run build:prepare-umd-folder       && tsc -p tsconfig-umd.json      --extendedDiagnostics && npm run rename-typeslike-umd       && npm run embed-source-contents-umd       && npm run copy-recusive-umd
scripts.build-es2015: npm run build:prepare-es2015-folder    && tsc -p tsconfig-es2015.json   --extendedDiagnostics && npm run rename-typeslike-es2015    && npm run embed-source-contents-es2015    && npm run copy-recusive-es2015
scripts.build-esnext: npm run build:prepare-esnext-folder    && tsc -p tsconfig-esnext.json   --extendedDiagnostics && npm run rename-typeslike-esnext    && npm run embed-source-contents-esnext    && npm run copy-recusive-esnext
scripts.build-dist-test: npm run build:prepare-dist-test-folder && tsc -p tsconfig-test.json     --extendedDiagnostics && npm run rename-typeslike-dist-test && npm run embed-source-contents-dist-test && npm run copy-recusive-dist-test
scripts.build-dist-dev: npm run build:prepare-dist-dev-folder  && tsc                           --extendedDiagnostics && npm run rename-typeslike-dist-dev                                             && npm run copy-recusive-dist-dev
scripts.build-dist-dev-incr: npm run build:prepare-dist-dev-folder  && tsc --build                                         && npm run rename-typeslike-dist-dev  && npm run embed-source-contents-dist-dev  && npm run copy-recusive-dist-dev
scripts.build-vscode-rebuild: npm run clear-dist-dev && npm run build-dist-dev
scripts.build-vscode-rebuild-dist: npm run clear-dist     && npm run build-dist
scripts.rename-typeslike-umd: node ../../build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ../../dist/json-playback-recorder-ts/umd/src    -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.d.ts -relativeTargetFile typeslike.d.ts -verbose true && node ../../build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ../../dist/json-playback-recorder-ts/umd/src    -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.js -relativeTargetFile typeslike.js -verbose true
scripts.rename-typeslike-es2015: node ../../build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ../../dist/json-playback-recorder-ts/es2015/src -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.d.ts -relativeTargetFile typeslike.d.ts -verbose true && node ../../build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ../../dist/json-playback-recorder-ts/es2015/src -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.js -relativeTargetFile typeslike.js -verbose true
scripts.rename-typeslike-esnext: node ../../build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ../../dist/json-playback-recorder-ts/esnext/src -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.d.ts -relativeTargetFile typeslike.d.ts -verbose true && node ../../build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ../../dist/json-playback-recorder-ts/esnext/src -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.js -relativeTargetFile typeslike.js -verbose true
scripts.rename-typeslike-dist-test: node ../../build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ./dist-test/src                                 -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.d.ts -relativeTargetFile typeslike.d.ts -verbose true && node ../../build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ./dist-test/src                                 -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.js -relativeTargetFile typeslike.js -verbose true
scripts.rename-typeslike-dist-dev: node ../../build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ./dist-dev/src                                  -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dev.d.ts  -relativeTargetFile typeslike.d.ts -verbose true && node ../../build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ./dist-dev/src                                  -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dev.js  -relativeTargetFile typeslike.js -verbose true
scripts.clear-all: npm run clear-es2015 && npm run clear-umd && npm run clear-dist-test && npm run clear-dist-dev
scripts.clear-es2015: echo 'clear-es2015: doing nothing, same of clear-umd'
scripts.clear-esnext: echo 'clear-esnext: doing nothing, same of clear-umd'
scripts.embed-source-contents-es2015: echo 'embed-source-contents-es2015: doing nothing, same of embed-source-contents-umd'
scripts.embed-source-contents-esnext: echo 'embed-source-contents-esnext: doing nothing, same of embed-source-contents-umd'
scripts.embed-source-contents-dist-dev: echo 'embed-source-contents-dist-dev using inline source, not embedding'
scripts.build:prepare-es2015-folder: echo 'build:prepare-es2015-folder: doing nothing, same of build:prepare-umd-folder'
scripts.build:prepare-esnext-folder: echo 'build:prepare-esnext-folder: doing nothing, same of build:prepare-esnext-folder'
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run mocha-dist-test
scripts.browserify: npm run build && browserify dist-dev/index.js --outfile browser.js
